## BinaryHeap.from() method

Creates a new, shallow-copied binary heap instance from an iterable object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static from<T>(iterable: Iterable<T>): BinaryHeap<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  iterable | Iterable&lt;T&gt; | An iterable object to convert to a binary heap. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[BinaryHeap](./calcium.binaryheap.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
